summary: This bill, the SBIR/STTR Oversight Act, focuses on improving oversight and efficiency of the Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR) and Small Business Technology Transfer (STTR) programs. It amends reporting requirements, mandates a Comptroller General report on program effectiveness regarding diversification and commercialization, extends the report on award timeliness, and establishes a pilot program at the National Institutes of Health to accelerate award processes. The bill aims to improve the programs' impact on small businesses and technology innovation.
